verses.text: Now \w gather|strong="H1413"\w* thyself in \w troops|strong="H1416"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w troops|strong="H1416"\w*: he hath \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* against us: they shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* upon the \w cheek|strong="H3895"\w*.

But thou, \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w Ephratah|strong="H0672"\w*, \add though\add* thou be \w little|strong="H6810"\w* among the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add yet\add* out of thee shall he come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto me \add that is\add* to be \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; whose goings \w forth|strong="H4163"\w* \add have been\add* from of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*, from \w everlasting|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft everlasting: Heb. the days of eternity\f*

Therefore will he give them \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, until the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* she which \w travaileth|strong="H3205"\w* hath brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*: then the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And he shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* and \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* in the \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in the \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w* of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and they shall \w abide|strong="H3427"\w*: for now shall he be \w great|strong="H1431"\w* unto the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.  +  r 5.4  t feed: or, rule *

And this \add man\add* shall be the \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, when the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into our \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and when he shall \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* in our \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*, then shall we \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* against him \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w principal|strong="H5257"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 5.5 \ft principal: Heb. princes of\f*

And they shall \w waste|strong="H7462"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Nimrod|strong="H5248"\w* in the \w entrances|strong="H6607"\w* thereof: thus shall he \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add us\add* from the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w*, when he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* into our \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and when he \w treadeth|strong="H1869"\w* within our \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft waste: Heb. eat up\f*\f + \fr 5.6 \ft in the…: or, with her own naked swords\f*

And the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as a \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as the \w showers|strong="H7241"\w* upon the \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*, that \w tarrieth|strong="H6960"\w* not for \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, nor \w waiteth|strong="H3176"\w* for the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

¶ And the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall be among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* among the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, as a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* among the \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* of \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: who, if he go \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, both treadeth \w down|strong="H7429"\w*, and teareth in \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*, and none can \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft sheep: or, goats\f*
Thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall be lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* upon thine \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, and all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee, and I will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* thy \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*:
And I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w cities|strong="H6145"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w* all thy strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w*:
And I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w witchcrafts|strong="H3785"\w* out of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and thou shalt have no \add more\add* \w soothsayers|strong="H6049"\w*:

Thy graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* also will I cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, and thy standing \w images|strong="H4676"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee; and thou shalt no more \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft standing…: or, statues\f*

And I will pluck \w up|strong="H5428"\w* thy \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee: so will I \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H6145"\w*.\f + \fr 5.14 \ft cities: or, enemies\f*

And I will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, such as they have not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.
